name: Dillingerous Dragon
text:
2 DARK Dragon monsters
During your opponent's End Phase: You can target 1 Attack Position monster your opponent controls that did not declare an attack this turn; destroy that target, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its original ATK. If a "Rokket" monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field while this card is in the GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Dillingerous Dragon" once per turn.
